column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The impressionism collection is astounding
column2: though its really the American artworks that transcend our collective subconscious with classics like Grant Wood's "American Gothic" and Edward Hopper's "Nighthawks". Unfortunately
column3: those pieces are currently hidden away during the massive renovation
column4: but the upside is the projected 2009 opening of the Modern Art Wing
column5: which will bridge the museum directly with the increasingly glorious Millennium Park.
